full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS RJE BTZUN 'PHAGS MA GDUGS DKAR CAN GYI GTZO RKYANG LA BRTEN PA BKA' SDOD MGON PO LEGS LDAN MCHED GSUM GYI SGO NAS GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG PAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZLOG BSGYUR KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE'I TSUL DU DKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B (BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA GDUGS DKAR MO CAN GYIS CHO GA GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, RJE BTZUN DHARMA BADZRA GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS, JI SKAD DU, RKYEN SEL RIM GRO SOGS LA 'PHRAL DU SGRUB DGOS PA LTA BU SKABS, ,YO BYAD MI 'DZIM PA'I SBYIN BDAG DANG, CHO GA MI LCOG PA'I SGRUB PA PO 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR LA GZHI BYAS, ,SLOB DPON TZANDRA GO MI PAn CHEN BZANG PO BKRA SHIS, ,BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN, BLO BZANG CHOS KYI SOGS MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG DAM PA @018A *, ,RNAMS KYIS GSUNGS PA LTAR SU MA TI DH'I WARTAS BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DUS RTAG TU BDE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
